paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Additionally, variants found in individuals of the cardiogenetics cohort were in genes: MYBPC3 and KCNH2, both consistent with the pathologies investigated: Arrhythmia and Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on pathogenic classification.
variants.additional_notes: Variant was detected in a reanalysis of negative cases.
key_quotes: KCNH2, both consistent with the pathologies investigated: Arrhythmia and Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy.

tables_processed.table_caption: Causative variants only detected by the FJD-pipeline in the cancer and cardiovascular disease datasets as part of a systematic reanalysis of negative cases.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text and tables.
